kpi.name: M1008C270

kpi_info.title: FAILED HSPA CAPA TRIGGERED INTER-RNC IFHO DUE TO UTRAN
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Inter-RNC HSPA capability based IFHOs due to UTRAN. This counter includes also failed handovers to I-HSPA cells. UPDATED: When the inter-RNC inter-frequency handover fails due to some other than a UE related reason. This can be for example RANAP: RELOCATION PREPARATION FAILURE.

kpi.kpi_alias: FAILED HSPA CAPA TRIGGERED INTER-RNC IFHO DUE TO UTRAN
